CodeList.Name: Directly Observed Therapy Location

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the physical location at which the medication or therapy was observed, by the healthcare provider, as being taken by the subject.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A setting outside the clinic or a comparable health care facility, e.g. a doctor's office, the subject's home or workplace, a school, a public park, or a restaurant.
The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Directly Observed Therapy Location Terminology
